prompts: Create a mysterious Pokemon that resembles a letter and has a ghostly aura.
I want a unique psychic-type Pokemon that embodies the essence of ancient symbols.
Generate a Pokemon that looks like a floating letter, with dark colors and mystical eyes.
Make a simple yet intriguing Pokemon that represents knowledge and secrets in its design.
Imagine a ghost-type Pokemon that appears as an enigmatic character with an eye motif.
Design a creature that symbolizes communication and hidden messages with its unique shape.
Give me a Pokemon that looks like a letter and has a subtle, haunting presence.
